long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChordScroller will auto-scroll any webpage with chords for you.

v1.3.1: ChordScroller now saves last chosen values

* no more manual scrolling while playing along with the chords
* adjustable speed and offset for comfortable playing
* most websites supported

Press Ctrl+Shift+P to open popup and have fun!
